author: remm
msg: - Remove the URL i18n flag. Instead, provide a way to do a memory efficient
URL decoding. This should allow clean i18n support for the URL.
- Not optimal for TC 4.0.x performance wise (although the performance hit isn't very severe).
I will make a (simple) proposal to refactor the HEAD branch to take advantage of this

author: remm
msg: - Add a field to store the decoded URI.

author: billbarker
msg: Fix problems with the initial version.
This version almost runs (if you patch HexUtils with the one from j-t-c).  Cookies aren't working yet (strange), and POST seems to have issues.

author: billbarker
msg: Update to allow us to build both the 4.x and the 3.3.x jars.

author: billbarker
msg: They all compile, which is enough for an initial check-in.  The threading and socket handling is all standard 3.3.x stuff.
- Improve the handling of the Response headers.
- Review (and likely improve) the handling of the Request headers.
- Create the WAR module to allow this to be plugged in.
